entries.title: Warex (Backend Development)
entries.technologies: Golang, Gorm, Echo, MySQL, Hubspot, Mailgun, Bugsnag, Goose Migrations, Testify Suite
entries.description: Backend development for the Warex project while at Gaussy.

entries.title: LINE Fund Information Platform 'トークン'
entries.technologies: Ruby on Rails, LINE API, Reuters API
entries.description: Fullstack development of a fund information platform integrated with LINE, including API development and data fetching/processing from Reuters, at Robotfund.

entries.title: Fund Information Platform 'Better World'
entries.description: Fullstack development of a fund information platform with Reuters API integration, at Robotfund.

entries.title: Custom Audio Caching Service
entries.technologies: Golang, Docker, AWS, Text-to-Voice Service Integration
entries.description: Developed a Go-based service to compress, cache, and serve audio generated from text-to-voice, reducing API usage, at Robotfund.

entries.title: Content Sharing and Publishing Platform (e.g., Kidint)
entries.technologies: Ruby On Rails, AWS (S3, SNS), Angular, Facebook API, Google API
entries.description: API and backend development for a content sharing platform, including AWS integration and social media logins, at Allm Inc.

entries.title: Retail BI Customer Tracking Platform (Followup)
entries.description: Developed a WiFi-based customer tracking platform for retail business intelligence, including IoT service development on Raspberry Pi and BLE beacon integration, at Allm Inc.

entries.title: Triage Application 'JoinTriage' (API)
entries.description: API and frontend development for a triage application, including CI/CD setup, at Allm Inc.

entries.title: AI Research for Healthcare
entries.description: Conducted AI research involving image classification/recognition and data analysis/segmentation for healthcare applications, at Allm Inc.

entries.title: MMORPG API Backend '剣と魔法のログレス'
entries.description: Developed the API backend for a popular mobile MMORPG, at Aiming Inc.

entries.title: Kii Cloud Developer Portal
entries.description: Development of the developer portal for Kii Cloud, at Kii Inc.

entries.title: Iron Functions (Open Source Serverless Platform)
entries.technologies: Go (implied, as it's a serverless platform often built with Go)
entries.description: Provided support and maintenance for the Iron Functions open-source serverless platform, at Iron.io.

entries.title: Portfolio Website (This Project)
entries.technologies: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, PDFKit
entries.description: A multilingual, SSR-enabled portfolio website with dynamic PDF resume generation.
